definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc
Pingdingshan prefecture level city in Henan
Pingdingshan prefecture level city in Henan

sentences.english: Its basic characteristics are "level to level and oblique to oblique".
sentences.chinese: 其基本特徵是“仄頂仄，平頂平”。

sentences.english: Flat-top glaciers reflect main regional features of mass exchange.
sentences.chinese: 平頂冰川在很大程度上反映了物質交換的區域特徵。

sentences.english: And for example flat caps and some coronets, stem from Persia and Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 又如平頂帽和一些頭飾，均來源於波斯和阿富汗。

sentences.english: Scientists are puzzled by the guyots ' curiously flat tops.
sentences.chinese: 科學家爲平頂海山令人驚奇的頂部而困惑。

sentences.english: Otherwise, an approximate flat-top beam is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 否則，輸出一類平頂光束。

sentences.english: The steam used for production will adopt the residual heat from the thermal power plant of Tianyuan Salt Factory of Pingdingshan Haolong Corporation.
sentences.chinese: 生產用蒸汽利用平頂山皓龍公司天源製鹽廠電廠餘熱。

sentences.english: The flowers often form a conspicuous flat-topped umbel.
sentences.chinese: 其花朵常形成一個明顯的平頂傘形花序。

sentences.english: Blast hits coal mine in C China, 58 trapped.
sentences.chinese: 河南平頂山煤礦爆炸，58人被困。

sentences.english: Now the temple was crowded with men and women; all the rulers of the Philistines were there, and on the roof were about three thousand men and women watching Samson perform.
sentences.chinese: 房的平頂上約有三千男女，觀看參孫戲耍。

sentences.english: At the lower end of each roof slope, eaves purlins are provided over the ceiling joists.
sentences.chinese: 屋面兩坡的下方，檐口的連繫梁支承在平頂擱柵之上。

sentences.english: Forms a flat top making them suitable for automatic placement and reflow.
sentences.chinese: 形成了一個平頂使其成爲自動貼裝和迴流合適。

sentences.english: All the other public basilicas had flat ceilings supported by wooden beams.
sentences.chinese: 所有其他的巴西利卡都是由木樑支撐的平頂結構。

sentences.english: A cap with a flat circular top and a visor .
sentences.chinese: 有一個圓形平頂和帽舌的帽子。

sentences.english: A number of ceil in g joists run from one wall to the opposite wall.
sentences.chinese: 若干個平頂擱柵從一面牆伸向對面的牆。

sentences.english: Most of the guyots are located in the Pacific Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 大部分的平頂海山位於太平洋。

sentences.english: The prisoners disappear in single file into the gray flat-roofed building.
sentences.chinese: 這些俘虜排成單行走進灰色的平頂房子就不見了。
